text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: atha nArAyaNenendraz cakAra saha saMvidam
text.ur: atha nārāyaṇenendraś cakāra saha saṁvidam

text.ascii: avatartuM mahIM svargAd aMzataH sahitaH suraiH
text.ur: avatartuṁ mahīṁ svargād aṁśataḥ sahitaḥ suraiḥ

text.ascii: Adizya ca svayaM zakraH sarvAn eva divaukasaH
text.ud: आदिश्य च स्वयं शक्रः सर्वानेव दिवौकसः
text.ur: ādiśya ca svayaṁ śakraḥ sarvān eva divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: nirjagAma punas tasmAt kSayAn nArAyaNasya ha
text.ur: nirjagāma punas tasmāt kṣayān nārāyaṇasya ha

text.ascii: te 'marArivinAzAya sarvalokahitAya ca
text.ur: te ’marārivināśāya sarvalokahitāya ca

text.ascii: avateruH krameNemAM mahIM svargAd divaukasaH
text.ur: avateruḥ krameṇemāṁ mahīṁ svargād divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: tato brahmarSivaMzeSu pArthivarSikuleSu ca
text.ur: tato brahmarṣivaṁśeṣu pārthivarṣikuleṣu ca

text.ascii: jajJire rAjazArdUla yathAkAmaM divaukasaH
text.ur: jajñire rājaśārdūla yathākāmaṁ divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: dAnavAn rAkSasAMz caiva gandharvAn pannagAMs tathA
text.ur: dānavān rākṣasāṁś caiva gandharvān pannagāṁs tathā

text.ascii: puruSAdAni cAnyAni jaghnuH sattvAny anekazaH
text.ur: puruṣādāni cānyāni jaghnuḥ sattvāny anekaśaḥ

text.ascii: dAnavA rAkSasAz caiva gandharvAH pannagAs tathA
text.ur: dānavā rākṣasāś caiva gandharvāḥ pannagās tathā

text.ascii: na tAn balasthAn bAlye 'pi jaghnur bharatasattama
text.ur: na tān balasthān bālye ’pi jaghnur bharatasattama

text.ascii: janamejaya uvAca
text.ur: janamejaya uvāca

text.ascii: devadAnavasaMghAnAM gandharvApsarasAM tathA
text.ur: devadānavasaṁghānāṁ gandharvāpsarasāṁ tathā

text.ascii: mAnavAnAM ca sarveSAM tathA vai yakSarakSasAm
text.ud: मानवानां च सर्वेषां तथा वै यक्षरक्षसाम्
text.ur: mānavānāṁ ca sarveṣāṁ tathā vai yakṣarakṣasām

text.ascii: zrotum icchAmi tattvena saMbhavaM kRtsnam AditaH
text.ur: śrotum icchāmi tattvena saṁbhavaṁ kr̥tsnam āditaḥ

text.ascii: prANinAM caiva sarveSAM sarvazaH sarvavid dhy asi
text.ur: prāṇināṁ caiva sarveṣāṁ sarvaśaḥ sarvavid dhy asi

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: hanta te kathayiSyAmi namaskRtvA svayaMbhuve
text.ur: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi namaskr̥tvā svayaṁbhuve

text.ascii: surAdInAm ahaM samyag lokAnAM prabhavApyayam
text.ur: surādīnām ahaṁ samyag lokānāṁ prabhavāpyayam

text.ascii: brahmaNo mAnasAH putrA viditAH SaN maharSayaH
text.ur: brahmaṇo mānasāḥ putrā viditāḥ ṣaṇ maharṣayaḥ

text.ascii: marIcir atryaGgirasau pulastyaH pulahaH kratuH
text.ur: marīcir atryaṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ

text.ascii: marIceH kazyapaH putraH kazyapAt tu imAH prajAH
text.ud: मरीचेः कश्यपः पुत्रः कश्यपात्तु इमाः प्रजाः
text.ur: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putraḥ kaśyapāt tu imāḥ prajāḥ

text.ascii: prajajJire mahAbhAgA dakSakanyAs trayodaza
text.ur: prajajñire mahābhāgā dakṣakanyās trayodaśa

text.ascii: aditir ditir danuH kAlA anAyuH siMhikA muniH
text.ur: aditir ditir danuḥ kālā anāyuḥ siṁhikā muniḥ

text.ascii: krodhA prAvA ariSTA ca vinatA kapilA tathA
text.ud: क्रोधा प्रावा अरिष्टा च विनता कपिला तथा
text.ur: krodhā prāvā ariṣṭā ca vinatā kapilā tathā

text.ascii: kadrUz ca manujavyAghra dakSakanyaiva bhArata
text.ur: kadrūś ca manujavyāghra dakṣakanyaiva bhārata

text.ascii: etAsAM vIryasaMpannaM putrapautram anantakam
text.ur: etāsāṁ vīryasaṁpannaṁ putrapautram anantakam

text.ascii: adityAM dvAdazAdityAH saMbhUtA bhuvanezvarAH
text.ur: adityāṁ dvādaśādityāḥ saṁbhūtā bhuvaneśvarāḥ

text.ascii: ye rAjan nAmatas tAMs te kIrtayiSyAmi bhArata
text.ur: ye rājan nāmatas tāṁs te kīrtayiṣyāmi bhārata

text.ascii: dhAtA mitro 'ryamA zakro varuNaz cAMza eva ca
text.ud: धाता मित्रोऽर्यमा शक्रो वरुणश्चांश एव च
text.ur: dhātā mitro ’ryamā śakro varuṇaś cāṁśa eva ca

text.ascii: bhago vivasvAn pUSA ca savitA dazamas tathA
text.ur: bhago vivasvān pūṣā ca savitā daśamas tathā

text.ascii: ekAdazas tathA tvaSTA viSNur dvAdaza ucyate
text.ur: ekādaśas tathā tvaṣṭā viṣṇur dvādaśa ucyate

text.ascii: jaghanyajaH sa sarveSAm AdityAnAM guNAdhikaH
text.ur: jaghanyajaḥ sa sarveṣām ādityānāṁ guṇādhikaḥ

text.ascii: eka eva diteH putro hiraNyakazipuH smRtaH
text.ud: एक एव दितेः पुत्रो हिरण्यकशिपुः स्मृतः
text.ur: eka eva diteḥ putro hiraṇyakaśipuḥ smr̥taḥ

text.ascii: nAmnA khyAtAs tu tasyeme putrAH paJca mahAtmanaH
text.ud: नाम्ना ख्यातास्तु तस्येमे पुत्राः पञ्च महात्मनः
text.ur: nāmnā khyātās tu tasyeme putrāḥ pañca mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: prahrAdaH pUrvajas teSAM saMhrAdas tadanantaram
text.ur: prahrādaḥ pūrvajas teṣāṁ saṁhrādas tadanantaram

text.ascii: anuhrAdas tRtIyo 'bhUt tasmAc ca zibibASkalau
text.ur: anuhrādas tr̥tīyo ’bhūt tasmāc ca śibibāṣkalau

text.ascii: prahrAdasya trayaH putrAH khyAtAH sarvatra bhArata
text.ud: प्रह्रादस्य त्रयः पुत्राः ख्याताः सर्वत्र भारत
text.ur: prahrādasya trayaḥ putrāḥ khyātāḥ sarvatra bhārata

text.ascii: virocanaz ca kumbhaz ca nikumbhaz ceti vizrutAH
text.ur: virocanaś ca kumbhaś ca nikumbhaś ceti viśrutāḥ

text.ascii: virocanasya putro 'bhUd balir ekaH pratApavAn
text.ur: virocanasya putro ’bhūd balir ekaḥ pratāpavān

text.ascii: balez ca prathitaH putro bANo nAma mahAsuraH
text.ud: बलेश्च प्रथितः पुत्रो बाणो नाम महासुरः
text.ur: baleś ca prathitaḥ putro bāṇo nāma mahāsuraḥ

text.ascii: catvAriMzad danoH putrAH khyAtAH sarvatra bhArata
text.ur: catvāriṁśad danoḥ putrāḥ khyātāḥ sarvatra bhārata

text.ascii: teSAM prathamajo rAjA vipracittir mahAyazAH
text.ur: teṣāṁ prathamajo rājā vipracittir mahāyaśāḥ

text.ascii: zambaro namuciz caiva pulomA ceti vizrutaH
text.ur: śambaro namuciś caiva pulomā ceti viśrutaḥ

text.ascii: asilomA ca kezI ca durjayaz caiva dAnavaH
text.ud: असिलोमा च केशी च दुर्जयश्चैव दानवः
text.ur: asilomā ca keśī ca durjayaś caiva dānavaḥ

text.ascii: ayaHzirA azvazirA ayaHzaGkuz ca vIryavAn
text.ur: ayaḥśirā aśvaśirā ayaḥśaṅkuś ca vīryavān

text.ascii: tathA gaganamUrdhA ca vegavAn ketumAMz ca yaH
text.ur: tathā gaganamūrdhā ca vegavān ketumāṁś ca yaḥ

text.ascii: svarbhAnur azvo 'zvapatir vRSaparvAjakas tathA
text.ur: svarbhānur aśvo ’śvapatir vr̥ṣaparvājakas tathā

text.ascii: azvagrIvaz ca sUkSmaz ca tuhuNDaz ca mahAsuraH
text.ur: aśvagrīvaś ca sūkṣmaś ca tuhuṇḍaś ca mahāsuraḥ

text.ascii: isRpA ekacakraz ca virUpAkSo harAharau
text.ur: isr̥pā ekacakraś ca virūpākṣo harāharau

text.ascii: nicandraz ca nikumbhaz ca kupathaH kApathas tathA
text.ur: nicandraś ca nikumbhaś ca kupathaḥ kāpathas tathā

text.ascii: zarabhaH zalabhaz caiva sUryAcandramasau tathA
text.ur: śarabhaḥ śalabhaś caiva sūryācandramasau tathā

text.ascii: iti khyAtA danor vaMze dAnavAH parikIrtitAH
text.ur: iti khyātā danor vaṁśe dānavāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

text.ascii: anyau tu khalu devAnAM sUryAcandramasau smRtau
text.ud: अन्यौ तु खलु देवानां सूर्याचन्द्रमसौ स्मृतौ
text.ur: anyau tu khalu devānāṁ sūryācandramasau smr̥tau

text.ascii: ime ca vaMze prathitAH sattvavanto mahAbalAH
text.ud: इमे च वंशे प्रथिताः सत्त्ववन्तो महाबलाः
text.ur: ime ca vaṁśe prathitāḥ sattvavanto mahābalāḥ

text.ascii: danuputrA mahArAja daza dAnavapuGgavAH
text.ur: danuputrā mahārāja daśa dānavapuṅgavāḥ

text.ascii: ekAkSo mRtapA vIraH pralambanarakAv api
text.ur: ekākṣo mr̥tapā vīraḥ pralambanarakāv api

text.ascii: vAtApiH zatrutapanaH zaThaz caiva mahAsuraH
text.ur: vātāpiḥ śatrutapanaḥ śaṭhaś caiva mahāsuraḥ

text.ascii: gaviSThaz ca danAyuz ca dIrghajihvaz ca dAnavaH
text.ur: gaviṣṭhaś ca danāyuś ca dīrghajihvaś ca dānavaḥ

text.ascii: asaMkhyeyAH smRtAs teSAM putrAH pautrAz ca bhArata
text.ur: asaṁkhyeyāḥ smr̥tās teṣāṁ putrāḥ pautrāś ca bhārata

text.ascii: siMhikA suSuve putraM rAhuM candrArkamardanam
text.ur: siṁhikā suṣuve putraṁ rāhuṁ candrārkamardanam

text.ascii: sucandraM candrahantAraM tathA candravimardanam
text.ur: sucandraṁ candrahantāraṁ tathā candravimardanam

text.ascii: krUrasvabhAvaM krUrAyAH putrapautram anantakam
text.ur: krūrasvabhāvaṁ krūrāyāḥ putrapautram anantakam

text.ascii: gaNaH krodhavazo nAma krUrakarmArimardanaH
text.ur: gaṇaḥ krodhavaśo nāma krūrakarmārimardanaḥ

text.ascii: anAyuSaH punaH putrAz catvAro 'surapuMgavAH
text.ur: anāyuṣaḥ punaḥ putrāś catvāro ’surapuṁgavāḥ

text.ascii: vikSaro balavIrau ca vRtraz caiva mahAsuraH
text.ur: vikṣaro balavīrau ca vr̥traś caiva mahāsuraḥ

text.ascii: kAlAyAH prathitAH putrAH kAlakalpAH prahAriNaH
text.ur: kālāyāḥ prathitāḥ putrāḥ kālakalpāḥ prahāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: bhuvi khyAtA mahAvIryA dAnaveSu paraMtapAH
text.ur: bhuvi khyātā mahāvīryā dānaveṣu paraṁtapāḥ

text.ascii: vinAzanaz ca krodhaz ca hantA krodhasya cAparaH
text.ur: vināśanaś ca krodhaś ca hantā krodhasya cāparaḥ

text.ascii: krodhazatrus tathaivAnyaH kAleyA iti vizrutAH
text.ur: krodhaśatrus tathaivānyaḥ kāleyā iti viśrutāḥ

text.ascii: asurANAm upAdhyAyaH zukras tv RSisuto 'bhavat
text.ur: asurāṇām upādhyāyaḥ śukras tv r̥ṣisuto ’bhavat

text.ascii: khyAtAz cozanasaH putrAz catvAro 'surayAjakAH
text.ur: khyātāś cośanasaḥ putrāś catvāro ’surayājakāḥ

text.ascii: tvaSTAvaras tathAtriz ca dvAv anyau mantrakarmiNau
text.ur: tvaṣṭāvaras tathātriś ca dvāv anyau mantrakarmiṇau

text.ascii: tejasA sUryasaMkAzA brahmalokaprabhAvanAH
text.ur: tejasā sūryasaṁkāśā brahmalokaprabhāvanāḥ

text.ascii: ity eSa vaMzaprabhavaH kathitas te tarasvinAm
text.ur: ity eṣa vaṁśaprabhavaḥ kathitas te tarasvinām

text.ascii: asurANAM surANAM ca purANe saMzruto mayA
text.ud: असुराणां सुराणां च पुराणे संश्रुतो मया
text.ur: asurāṇāṁ surāṇāṁ ca purāṇe saṁśruto mayā

text.ascii: eteSAM yad apatyaM tu na zakyaM tad azeSataH
text.ud: एतेषां यदपत्यं तु न शक्यं तदशेषतः
text.ur: eteṣāṁ yad apatyaṁ tu na śakyaṁ tad aśeṣataḥ

text.ascii: prasaMkhyAtuM mahIpAla guNabhUtam anantakam
text.ur: prasaṁkhyātuṁ mahīpāla guṇabhūtam anantakam

text.ascii: tArkSyaz cAriSTanemiz ca tathaiva garuDAruNau
text.ur: tārkṣyaś cāriṣṭanemiś ca tathaiva garuḍāruṇau

text.ascii: AruNir vAruNiz caiva vainateyA iti smRtAH
text.ur: āruṇir vāruṇiś caiva vainateyā iti smr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: zeSo 'nanto vAsukiz ca takSakaz ca bhujaMgamaH
text.ur: śeṣo ’nanto vāsukiś ca takṣakaś ca bhujaṁgamaḥ

text.ascii: kUrmaz ca kulikaz caiva kAdraveyA mahAbalAH
text.ur: kūrmaś ca kulikaś caiva kādraveyā mahābalāḥ

text.ascii: bhImasenograsenau ca suparNo varuNas tathA
text.ur: bhīmasenograsenau ca suparṇo varuṇas tathā

text.ascii: gopatir dhRtarASTraz ca sUryavarcAz ca saptamaH
text.ur: gopatir dhr̥tarāṣṭraś ca sūryavarcāś ca saptamaḥ

text.ascii: patravAn arkaparNaz ca prayutaz caiva vizrutaH
text.ur: patravān arkaparṇaś ca prayutaś caiva viśrutaḥ

text.ascii: bhImaz citrarathaz caiva vikhyAtaH sarvavid vazI
text.ur: bhīmaś citrarathaś caiva vikhyātaḥ sarvavid vaśī

text.ascii: tathA zAlizirA rAjan pradyumnaz ca caturdazaH
text.ur: tathā śāliśirā rājan pradyumnaś ca caturdaśaḥ

text.ascii: kaliH paJcadazaz caiva nAradaz caiva SoDazaH
text.ur: kaliḥ pañcadaśaś caiva nāradaś caiva ṣoḍaśaḥ

text.ascii: ity ete devagandharvA mauneyAH parikIrtitAH
text.ur: ity ete devagandharvā mauneyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

text.ascii: atas tu bhUtAny anyAni kIrtayiSyAmi bhArata
text.ur: atas tu bhūtāny anyāni kīrtayiṣyāmi bhārata

text.ascii: anavadyAm anuvazAm anUnAm aruNAM priyAm
text.ur: anavadyām anuvaśām anūnām aruṇāṁ priyām

text.ascii: anUpAM subhagAM bhAsIm iti prAvA vyajAyata
text.ur: anūpāṁ subhagāṁ bhāsīm iti prāvā vyajāyata

text.ascii: siddhaH pUrNaz ca barhI ca pUrNAzaz ca mahAyazAH
text.ud: सिद्धः पूर्णश्च बर्ही च पूर्णाशश्च महायशाः
text.ur: siddhaḥ pūrṇaś ca barhī ca pūrṇāśaś ca mahāyaśāḥ

text.ascii: brahmacArI ratiguNaH suparNaz caiva saptamaH
text.ur: brahmacārī ratiguṇaḥ suparṇaś caiva saptamaḥ

text.ascii: vizvAvasuz ca bhAnuz ca sucandro dazamas tathA
text.ur: viśvāvasuś ca bhānuś ca sucandro daśamas tathā

text.ascii: ity ete devagandharvAH prAveyAH parikIrtitAH
text.ur: ity ete devagandharvāḥ prāveyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

text.ascii: imaM tv apsarasAM vaMzaM viditaM puNyalakSaNam
text.ur: imaṁ tv apsarasāṁ vaṁśaṁ viditaṁ puṇyalakṣaṇam

text.ascii: prAvAsUta mahAbhAgA devI devarSitaH purA
text.ur: prāvāsūta mahābhāgā devī devarṣitaḥ purā

text.ascii: alambusA mizrakeSI vidyutparNA tulAnaghA
text.ur: alambusā miśrakeṣī vidyutparṇā tulānaghā

text.ascii: aruNA rakSitA caiva rambhA tadvan manoramA
text.ur: aruṇā rakṣitā caiva rambhā tadvan manoramā

text.ascii: asitA ca subAhuz ca suvratA subhujA tathA
text.ud: असिता च सुबाहुश्च सुव्रता सुभुजा तथा
text.ur: asitā ca subāhuś ca suvratā subhujā tathā

text.ascii: supriyA cAtibAhuz ca vikhyAtau ca hahAhuhU
text.ur: supriyā cātibāhuś ca vikhyātau ca hahāhuhū

text.ascii: tumburuz ceti catvAraH smRtA gandharvasattamAH
text.ur: tumburuś ceti catvāraḥ smr̥tā gandharvasattamāḥ

text.ascii: amRtaM brAhmaNA gAvo gandharvApsarasas tathA
text.ur: amr̥taṁ brāhmaṇā gāvo gandharvāpsarasas tathā

text.ascii: apatyaM kapilAyAs tu purANe parikIrtitam
text.ur: apatyaṁ kapilāyās tu purāṇe parikīrtitam

text.ascii: iti te sarvabhUtAnAM saMbhavaH kathito mayA
text.ud: इति ते सर्वभूतानां संभवः कथितो मया
text.ur: iti te sarvabhūtānāṁ saṁbhavaḥ kathito mayā

text.ascii: yathAvat parisaMkhyAto gandharvApsarasAM tathA
text.ur: yathāvat parisaṁkhyāto gandharvāpsarasāṁ tathā

text.ascii: bhujagAnAM suparNAnAM rudrANAM marutAM tathA
text.ur: bhujagānāṁ suparṇānāṁ rudrāṇāṁ marutāṁ tathā

text.ascii: gavAM ca brAhmaNAnAM ca zrImatAM puNyakarmaNAm
text.ud: गवां च ब्राह्मणानां च श्रीमतां पुण्यकर्मणाम्
text.ur: gavāṁ ca brāhmaṇānāṁ ca śrīmatāṁ puṇyakarmaṇām

text.ascii: AyuSyaz caiva puNyaz ca dhanyaH zrutisukhAvahaH
text.ur: āyuṣyaś caiva puṇyaś ca dhanyaḥ śrutisukhāvahaḥ

text.ascii: zrotavyaz caiva satataM zrAvyaz caivAnasUyatA
text.ur: śrotavyaś caiva satataṁ śrāvyaś caivānasūyatā

text.ascii: imaM tu vaMzaM niyamena yaH paThen; mahAtmanAM brAhmaNadevasaMnidhau
text.ud: इमं तु वंशं नियमेन यः पठे;न्महात्मनां ब्राह्मणदेवसंनिधौ
text.ur: imaṁ tu vaṁśaṁ niyamena yaḥ paṭhen; mahātmanāṁ brāhmaṇadevasaṁnidhau

text.ascii: apatyalAbhaM labhate sa puSkalaM; zriyaM yazaH pretya ca zobhanAM gatim
text.ud: अपत्यलाभं लभते स पुष्कलं; श्रियं यशः प्रेत्य च शोभनां गतिम्
text.ur: apatyalābhaṁ labhate sa puṣkalaṁ; śriyaṁ yaśaḥ pretya ca śobhanāṁ gatim
